name: Asharru's Hope
flavor: "I know not why we left the Reef, nor why we live so long, nor even why we are called Awoken. But I hope one day to have answers." —Asharru

name: Claw of Command
flavor: On the might of your hand does your authority depend.

name: Cyclopean Enigma
flavor: "More eyes, more problems. That's what I always say."

name: Echo of Honor
flavor: "For he was once of your City, and honored there." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Firebreak Eternal
flavor: A piece of the Fire Victorious, the ever-burning flame of the Titan Firebreak order.

name: Fortuna Pendant
flavor: A necklace made out of the remains of the asteroid destroyed during the Reef Wars.

name: Horn of Six Wars
flavor: How many have died with the blast of this horn ringing in their ears?

name: Iglatho-Cyu
flavor: Drink, if you dare.

name: Incubation Shell
flavor: Cryptarchs still have no idea where Vex come from, or how they came to be.

name: Intact Warmind Core
flavor: Codename: MARTEL. Parent: !REDACTED!. Status: ILIODOR COMPLETE.

name: Judgment of Mars
flavor: Cryptarchs say this orb is our first clue toward the identity of the Cabal commander leading the siege of Mars.

name: Kabr's Pocket Watch
flavor: The tick-tock of this strange watch sometimes feels like a heartbeat.

name: Radegast's Blade
flavor: So long as this sword was whole, the Iron Banner could not be broken.

name: Saint-14's Ring
flavor: Was there ever another Guardian so beloved by the people?" —Paean to Saint-14

name: Scales of Eao
flavor: WE STAND UPON OUR OWN UNENDING DEATHS.

name: Scroll of Eimin-Tin
flavor: You hold in your hands the last record of a long-dead civilization.

name: Skyburners' Obol
flavor: A coin suspected to be part of a Cabal funerary rite.

name: Sootpearl
flavor: These oddly beautiful orbs can sometimes be found sunk into the rot and filth of the Dreadnaught.

name: Stoneborn Relic
flavor: A piece of the City's first Wall, carved into the shape of the sigil of the Titan Stoneborn order.

name: Sunscorched Lens
flavor: "We have mastered the art of shaping and tempering physical Light."

name: Vell Tarlowe's Vigil
flavor: His Light is gone, but his memory remains.

name: Wei Ning's Cong
flavor: This ancient jade artifact has been in the Hive's possession ever since Wei Ning's heroic death.

name: Wings of Apris-Fol
flavor: "To you goes the glory and the honor of battle." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Yzoz's Pendulum
flavor: "First test of the mechanism codenamed Yzoz's Pendulum was...not ideal." —RECORD 360-CHASM-2334

name: Oversoul's Pang
flavor: It writhes, shivers, and pulses with pain.

name: Bretomart's Pledge
flavor: "I will not let you down. This is what I was reborn to do." —Lady Bretomart

name: SIVA Core
flavor: It's unclear what this SIVA generator powers, but its surface shivers with potential.

name: Perfected SIVA Core
flavor: "Be cautious with the SIVA you find. This all started because we unleashed what we shouldn't have." —Lord Saladin

name: Continuum Pin
flavor: A fragment from a Vex portal that creates an eddy in the timestream.

name: Agema
flavor: A derivative of the Gatewatch pattern, Agema armor incorporates the lessons of too many bloody stands.

name: Arihant
flavor: All Light has a source: a fire, a filament, a star. Battle is how we seek that origin." - Pujari, The Transcripts

name: Armada
flavor: "Get behind me."

name: Astrolord Plate
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: Blindsight Plate
flavor: "I shrouded myself so when the Light returned I could see it all the clearer." —Parables of the Allspring

name: BRONTIOS
flavor: Subtlety is overrated.

name: Commando
flavor: The Vanguard selects elite Titans to form commando cadres.

name: Commando Custom
flavor: Commando tactical rig repurposed for Crucible competition.

name: Crest of Alpha Lupi
flavor: Whoever survives our passing does so only by our consent.

name: Cuirass of the Witness
flavor: "One king falls. Ten rise to take the power." —Variks

name: Dead Light Plate
flavor: "Success is not about survival. It is about discovery." —Arach Modesta

name: Desolate Plate
flavor: Take your new shape.

name: DURGA-GNT
flavor: I am a DURGA-GNT LOAD BEARING CUIRASS. Feed me bullets.

name: Duskrender
flavor: He never sought glory or prizes. Only peace.

name: Elector's Heart
flavor: They will know you fight not for yourself, but for the people's will.

name: Exodus Plate
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Fieldplate
flavor: History is a question of armor. What will it take to kill us? Fieldplate says: much more than this.

name: Firebreak
flavor: Beneath the armored superstructure, Titan plate is tiled with inertial sinks and field drivers.

name: Garuda
flavor: "We will not follow the orders of a craven and a sycophant." —Lilavati-12

name: Gatewatch
flavor: Born in the dark age that followed the Collapse, this is a formidable defense for the novice Titan.

name: Gwalior
flavor: The Gwalior pattern improves on standard Fieldplate while remaining economical.

name: Harrowed War Numen's Chest
flavor: Death is the game, and the game is always death.

name: Heart of the Justicar
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Heart of the Order
flavor: The City is divided. We must unite beneath a single will.

name: Heliopause Plate
flavor: The Sun used to give us life. Now, staying near the Sun will be our doom.

name: Hesperos
flavor: This suit was designed as an homage to the Golden Age Hesperonauts.

name: Highlander
flavor: The breastplate is reinforced by ribs of relic iron, as tough as it is precious.

name: Holdfast
flavor: "I didn't get shot. I never get shot. I just body-checked the missile."

name: Illyrian
flavor: Not so much a formal Firebreak variant as the collected wisdom of Titans interested in peak performance.

name: Immanent War Plate
flavor: Conflict is the mother of reality.

name: Infinite Lines Plate
flavor: "I saw myself! Slaying the Darkness! That's what I saw!" —RECORD 344-CHASM-6872

name: Iron Breed Plate
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Plate
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Plate
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan
flavor: "I'm Nobody."

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: In Jovian exploration, as in all things, the Titans will lead the charge.

name: Kabr's Wrath
flavor: In the aftermath, he became obsessed with the machines.

name: Kallipolis Plate
flavor: The City's ruler must be a warrior as well as a philosopher.

name: Kellslayer's Cuirass
flavor: I am a walking tank. My arsenal, endless. The result of my ire, devastation.

name: Knight
flavor: Every Guardian is a priceless resource. Titan armor is an incubator for legends.

name: Lightmail
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

name: Molniya
flavor: Armored in the thunderbolt.

name: Molniya Custom
flavor: Match-grade superheavy armor: a wearable tank.

name: Monitor
flavor: "The Cabal centurion opened up on her at point-blank, and we heard the most fearsome sound. She was laughing."

name: Murvaux
flavor: "Luke Romagne. Gave his last full measure in the European Dead Zone." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

name: MYCENAE
flavor: More at home in a museum than in the field.

name: Objekt 959 Plate
flavor: Prototype assault armor repurposed for Crucible play.

name: Oblivion Plate
flavor: Humanity has been caged. We will break the bars.

name: Pacorus
flavor: "No father should have to bury their child."

name: Pandion
flavor: Crucible variant. The shock-tempering aerofoam harness is designed to absorb punishment.

name: Plate of No Tomorrow
flavor: War is the struggle to exist. Everything real is a combatant.

name: Plate of the Exile
flavor: "Let the heat melt your body so your soul might flow with the river of time." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Plate of the Pariah
flavor: "I welcome every challenge, for it only makes me stronger." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Plate of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Queen's Guard Plate
flavor: An Awoken relic from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Raku Crucible Type
flavor: Crucible custom. Foamed plate structure with tight tolerances and overbuilt field drivers.

name: Raku Fulcrum
flavor: Crucible custom. Annealed plate boundaries provide superior shock distribution.

name: Scoutmail
flavor: This lightweight scout armor is durable and easily maintained.

name: Spearhead
flavor: "This burn's from a slug rifle. That one's a shock blade. This one...ah, yes. Wei Ning gave me a hug."

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Taroudant
flavor: Treat your armor with the same care that the first Titans treated the City walls.

name: The Armamentarium
flavor: For This, There Is One Remedy

name: Toutatis
flavor: Named for an ancient divinity, this pattern is built for targeted, aggressive action.

name: Twilight Garrison
flavor: "One day the Last City will be known as the First City."

name: Ursus Tactical
flavor: You don't wear full battle rattle to a Crucible match unless you expect something to interrupt the match.

name: Vanir
flavor: The legend of Ragnarok does not end with the death of the gods. There is a new world to build.

name: VISIGOTH
flavor: The preferred armor pattern of Jagi's Host.

name: War Numen's Chest
flavor: Death is the game, and the game is always death.

name: Watchers' Plate
flavor: "'Out of sight, out of mind,' they say. The Speaker wishes this was true." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Willbreaker's Resolve
flavor: Their blades break against your heart.

name: Winged Sun Plate
flavor: "Like a meteor burning until nothing is left but the idea of a Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Zhurong
flavor: Surrender is never an option.

name: Stellar Impact Plate
flavor: Welcome to Mark 2 STELLAR IMPACT. Have a nice war!

name: Scarab's Vigil Plate
flavor: "If you wish to learn the ways of war, look around you." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Iron Saga Plate
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Days of Iron Cuirass
flavor: "When we feared the sun would ne'er on heroes rise again, whose deeds began the new Days of Iron?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cosmoclast Plate
flavor: I'm not sure what you mean, General. Is this still about the Exodus program? ~SIVA.MEM.WB012

name: Raku Gwener Type 1
flavor: Crucible Variant. Modified by the Raku group to meet Lord Shaxx's rigorous standards.

name: Mangonel Type 2
flavor: "If the terrain does not suit your purposes, reshape it." —Lord Silimar

name: High Command Plate
flavor: Power is not a gift. It is a calling.

name: Eon Tracer Plate
flavor: "Eternities streamed past me like shooting stars…" —RECORD-449-CHASM-6887

name: Endling Plate
flavor: We are the last of our species.

name: Plate of Triumph
flavor: You carry this mythical insignia as lightly as you carried the weight of the world.

name: ACD/0 Feedback Fence
flavor: The Active Contact Defense system uses Warsat hull materials to store a retaliatory charge.

name: Agema
flavor: This gauntlet pattern boasts lightning-fast maintenance cycles.

name: Arihant
flavor: Philosophy divides those Titans who see battle as a question, and those who see it as an answer.

name: Armada
flavor: Spinmetal beneath the fieldplate. A caress beneath the crush.

name: Astrolord Gauntlets
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Blindsight Gauntlets
flavor: "With the sight I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

name: BRONTIOS
flavor: They can hear you coming. They are terrified.

name: Commando Custom
flavor: Some Titans prefer gauntlets with slow, smooth response. Others favor speed and strength.

name: Commando
flavor: A chemoreceptor array on the right gauntlet detects explosives and cues up handling instructions.

name: Dead Light Gauntlets
flavor: "At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

name: Desolate Gauntlets
flavor: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

name: DURGA-GNT
flavor: ERROR: Cannot connect with target_SKULL. Please locate target_SKULL and establish contact.

name: Duskrender
flavor: Vell Tarlowe was still a new Guardian when he joined the Titan Order of the Pilgrim Guard.

name: Elector's Gauntlets
flavor: True power comes from the hands of the people.

name: Exodus Gauntlets
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Fieldplate
flavor: Melee combat tests your nerve. Ignore every instinct to flee. Remember: you are a monster too.

name: Firebreak
flavor: Built for forward battle, the Firebreak patterns reward diligent maintenance.

name: Garuda
flavor: "Do not think your precious Tower has all the answers, or that your new rank will make you any better at fighting the Darkness." —Lilavati-12

name: Gatewatch
flavor: The gauntlet, vambrace, and joints of a Titan's arms must withstand colossal forces.

name: Gauntlets of No Tomorrow
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Gauntlets of the Exile
flavor: "Strengthen the body, empower the mind." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Gauntlets of the Pariah
flavor: "They cast him out. But his words never left." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Gauntlets of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Gwalior
flavor: "Total militarization would drive us to extinction." - Consensus transcript

name: Harrowed War Numen's Fist
flavor: The start is always the same. Enter his court, and call him out.

name: Heliopause Gauntlets
flavor: "We are not fatalists. We're optimists. We believe life exists beyond this dead orbit." —Arach Linde

name: Hesperos
flavor: The Hesperonauts installed the terraform engines and secured Venus's first colonies.

name: Highlander
flavor: Much of a Titan's physical strength comes from the field drivers beneath the plate.

name: Holdfast
flavor: Grip settings range from 'exquisite caress' to 'vengeful fist that does not know remorse'.

name: Illyrian
flavor: When ammunition runs dry, your armor itself must become a weapon.

name: Immanent War Gauntlets
flavor: Tomorrow will not be easily tamed.

name: Immolation Fists
flavor: "Don't let this sacrifice be in vain."

name: Infinite Lines Gauntlets
flavor: "I saw three queens. No, two. No...just one." —RECORD 351-CHASM-6915

name: Iron Breed Gauntlets
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Gauntlets
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Jolder, she whose mighty hammer taught the Darkness fear.

name: Iron Companion Gauntlets
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Gauntlets
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan
flavor: "From the wall's shadows to the furthest shores."

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: We will go beyond the Reef. But first we will be prepared.

name: Kabr's Brazen Grips
flavor: He consumed their technology like fire. Fashioning armor from their remnants.

name: Kallipolis Gauntlets
flavor: We cannot win the war beyond our walls without first winning the people within them.

name: Kellslayer's Grips
flavor: Who needs four arms? Two are more than enough to break bones.

name: Knight
flavor: The density of relic iron provides ample mass for inertial sinks to operate. It also breaks skulls.

name: Knightbone Guard
flavor: "There's nothing more satisfying than feeding a Knight a shard of their own." - Vell Tarlowe

name: Lightmail
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

name: Mau'ual's Maulers
flavor: Valus Mau'ual once thought himself mighty. Valus Mau'ual doesn't think much of anything anymore.

name: Molniya
flavor: "So I ask Wei Ning: what about the Darkness itself? What then? And she says: I'll punch it too." - Pahanin Errata

name: Molniya Custom
flavor: Mighty field drivers put armor-shattering force into every punch.

name: Monarch's Gauntlets
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Monitor
flavor: Be careful with your strength. Field-repairing a snapped trigger is inconvenient.

name: Murvaux
flavor: "Emonda Swale. Gave her last full measure in the Cosmodrome." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

name: MYCENAE
flavor: The previous owner of these gauntlets left nothing behind but a vague smell of sweat.

name: No Back Up Plans
flavor: No ammo? No problem.

name: Objekt 959 Guards
flavor: Exposed heat sinks dump vaporized coolant.

name: Oblivion Gauntlets
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Order's Gauntlets
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Pacorus
flavor: "You cannot understand this pain."

name: Pandion
flavor: Crucible variant. Preprogrammed with thousands of gripping, shoving, throwing and catching motions.

name: Queen's Guard Gauntlets
flavor: The hand of the throne.

name: Raku Crucible Type
flavor: Crucible custom. Memory metal insets help form a perfect fist, each and every time.

name: Raku Fulcrum
flavor: Crucible custom. Haptic pads provide feedback on weapon performance.

name: Ruin Wings
flavor: In the Garden grows a tree of silver wings. The leaves are ruin, the bark disaster. Of the seeds we do not speak.

name: Scoutmail
flavor: Titan gauntlets typically leave the fingers free of bulky armor. Weapon handling is paramount.

name: Spearhead
flavor: "To conserve ammo, we disrupted the enemy command structure with several sharp blows to the skull." —Wei Ning

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Taroudant
flavor: "The City's defenses are only as strong as your two arms."

name: Thagomizers
flavor: "Don't get too close."

name: Toutatis
flavor: "Your job on the fireteam is to stand when everything else seems sure to fall."

name: Ursus Tactical
flavor: Field drivers serve the twin purposes of boosting strength and absorbing shock.

name: Vanir
flavor: Massive pauldron-mounted inertial sinks help absorb the shock of incoming fire.

name: VISIGOTH
flavor: The preferred armor pattern of Jagi's Host.

name: War Numen's Fist
flavor: The start is always the same. Enter his court, and call him out.

name: Watchers' Gauntlets
flavor: "The watcher does not just observe. The watcher defines the observed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Willbreaker's Fists
flavor: Take what is yours.

name: Winged Sun Gauntlets
flavor: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Witness Gauntlets
flavor: "Without a leader, the Taken are a force of nature. They feel only hunger and know only rage." —Eris Morn

name: Zhurong
flavor: "Your first duty is to the people of the City." —Pilgrim Guard

name: Stellar Impact Gauntlets
flavor: Welcome to Mark 2 STELLAR IMPACT. Optimized for concussive orbital reentry.

name: Spliced Cosmoclast Gauntlets
flavor: Doctor Bray, I'm sure you've realized SIVA's applications extend beyond colonization. ~SIVA.MEM.CL011

name: Scarab's Vigil Gauntlets
flavor: "Step forward, if you think you can challenge me." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Gauntlets
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Days of Iron Gauntlets
flavor: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cosmoclast Gauntlets
flavor: Doctor Bray, I'm sure you've realized SIVA's applications extend beyond colonization. ~SIVA.MEM.CL011

name: Thagomizers
flavor: Don't get too close.

name: Raku Gwener Type 1
flavor: Crucible variant. Combining the best of Golden Age and City Age innovation.

name: Mangonel Type 2
flavor: "Ponder and deliberate before you make a move." —Sun Tsu

name: High Command Gauntlets
flavor: Your deeds speak for themselves.

name: Eon Tracer Gauntlets
flavor: "I can never find the beginning, the place where the path forks." —RECORD 448-CHASM-6808

name: Endling Gauntlets
flavor: We cannot let the lineage end with us.

name: Fists of Triumph
flavor: Victory and peace lie within your grasp. Take and hold them.

name: Agema
flavor: It is one thing to stand against enemy fire, and quite another to keep your bearings through it.

name: Agema White
flavor: The Sun Legion order donated this helmet for the use of newly reborn Titans.

name: An Insurmountable Skullfort
flavor: BRAINVAULT Sigma-ACTIUM-IX Cranial Dreadnought (Invincible Type)

name: Arihant
flavor: A story of Saint-14 holds that, when grappling with a great Kell, he caved in the Fallen's head with one blow from his own.

name: Armada
flavor: "Integrated WEXFORD com set. Seemed effective. Removed in favor of more armor." - notes on the armor pattern

name: Astrolord Helm
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Battlecage of Kabr
flavor: Kabr fought the Vex alone. But somehow they didn't kill him.

name: Bright Ward
flavor: The warriors' helms gleamed bright in the sunlight.

name: BRONTIOS
flavor: This helmet's exterior speakers have adjustable volume. Your battle cries will break your enemy's eardrums.

name: Circuit Keeper
flavor: Don't outthink your opponents. Outfly them.

name: Commando Custom
flavor: The Crucible variant of this helmet pattern removes strategic threat monitors to reduce mass and save power.

name: Commando
flavor: "The best defense is a good offense. We are both shield and sword." —Holborn

name: Crash Helmet
flavor: "What's a few broken bones between friends?" —Marcus Ren

name: Cultist's Helm
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Darkblade Helm
flavor: "Alak-Hul, the Darkblade, is laid low. And thus Vell Tarlowe is avenged." —Eris Morn

name: Dead Light Helm
flavor: "Listen. Some stars won't stop calling to us." —Arach Linde

name: Desolate Helm
flavor: A smell of ozone. A distant scream. A feeling of dread.

name: DURGA-GNT
flavor: I am a DURGA-GNT SKULL BUCKET. Please bucket your skull before entering combat.

name: Duskrender
flavor: He died as he lived: a mighty shield against the Darkness.

name: Elector's Casque
flavor: This we pledge: to die for your right to be heard.

name: Empyrean Bellicose
flavor: This barely understood Golden Age technology once held aloft the floating gardens of Pomona Mons. Now, it's stopping bullets.

name: Eternal Warrior
flavor: Absolute, unflinching resolve.

name: Exodus Helm
flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

name: Fieldplate
flavor: Fieldplate's iconic domed helmet minimizes shot traps.

name: Firebreak
flavor: The trick isn't landing the headbutt - it's disengaging when you get stuck.

name: Garuda
flavor: "You won't see us again. We'll forge a new path." —Lilavati-12

name: Gatewatch
flavor: An armored helmet protects against fragmentation and gunshot, galvanized by the Titan's own Light.

name: Golden Bull Mask
flavor: "A sacrifice is required." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Gwalior
flavor: The abstract etching on the interior recalls Earth's great fortresses. Do not admire during combat.

name: Harrowed War Numen's Crown
flavor: Show them you can contain multitudes, and your interiority will spawn nightmares.

name: Heliopause Helm
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Helm of Inmost Light
flavor: "The light shines brightest in those it consumes."

name: Helm of No Tomorrow
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Helm of Saint-14
flavor: "He walked out into the demon light. But at the end he was brighter." - Paean to Saint-14

name: Helm of the Exile
flavor: Don't you find it strange that the one called The Speaker rarely has anything useful to say?" —Sayings of the Disciples

name: Helm of the Pariah
flavor: "The sun must set before it will rise again." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Helm of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Helmet of the Jade Rabbit
flavor: "There is a precision in speed. The slightest shift can result in victory…or end in disaster." —Lord Shaxx

name: Hesperos
flavor: At the dawn of the Golden Age, the Hesperonauts were the first to descend into Venus's boiling mists.

name: Highlander
flavor: Tradition influences Titan mark and armor design alike. The price of error could be extinction, so proven technique dominates.

name: Holdfast
flavor: The blind stare of duty.

name: Illyrian
flavor: Some accuse the Firebreak orders of rabid, mindless aggression. But their rabid aggression is quite deliberate.

name: Immanent War Helm
flavor: Helmets can't protect against attacks from within.

name: Infinite Lines Helm
flavor: "I saw Darkness. No Light, no Earth, no air. Only Darkness. I...I can't breathe..." —RECORD 342-CHASM-6827

name: Iron Breed Great Helm
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Helm
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Silimar, he who was the Last City's first wall.

name: Iron Companion Helm
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Great Helm
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan
flavor: Why do they always assume Titans aren't clever?

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: Our debt to the Reef and its Queen will not be forgotten.

name: Justicar's Casque
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Kallipolis Crown
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Kellslayer's Helm
flavor: They are pirates and scavengers, picking at all we were...all we are. I take great pleasure in picking back.

name: Knight
flavor: Older military doctrines derided survivability as a lesser cousin to firepower and aggression. They did not endure.

name: Lightmail
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

name: Molniya Custom T3
flavor: "The blind face stared down at me. The only light came from ricochets sparking off her brow."

name: Molniya
flavor: Leave all doubt behind.

name: Momentum Shield
flavor: Many will fly. Only one will win.

name: Monitor
flavor: What's the largest, fastest, most lethal thing you've ever stopped with your head?

name: Murvaux
flavor: "Gunnvor, the Dawncaller. Gave her last full measure at the Ocean of Storms." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

name: MYCENAE
flavor: This helmet must be centuries old. Smells like it, anyway.

name: Objekt 959 Helm
flavor: The wee little antenna is always getting shot off.

name: Oblivion Helm
flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

name: Order's Casque
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Pacorus
flavor: "I promise, my son, I will avenge you."

name: Pandion
flavor: Crucible variant. Microscopic layers of rubber and synthetic fiber provide cutting-edge defense.

name: Queen's Guard Helm
flavor: "Show me all that I have yet to rule."

name: Raku Crucible Type
flavor: Crucible custom. Plate lining provides constant transcranial magnetic stimulation to enhance alertness.

name: Raku Fulcrum
flavor: Crucible custom. Ambient subsonics help calibrate reflex response.

name: Scoutmail
flavor: Titan helmets are designed to revert to simple translucency in the event of an optics system failure.

name: Sojourn Helm
flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

name: Spearhead
flavor: PUJARI-WEI RATIO: colloquial. Amount of time Warlocks spend planning battles versus time Titans spend winning them.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Taroudant
flavor: For a Titan, determination is the highest of virtues.

name: The Glasshouse
flavor: Everything is luminous.

name: The Taikonaut
flavor: The helmets worn by the first Chinese lunar colonists of the Golden Age.

name: The Waiting Crown
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Toutatis
flavor: Coordinated strikes demand more than individual talent. The fireteam must cohere as a unit.

name: Ursus Tactical
flavor: Be wary. Combat sensors can't tell you whether a Warlock's Vortex is harmless or hostile.

name: Vanir
flavor: The blind gaze of justice.

name: VISIGOTH
flavor: You could once hear Mozart from its speakers. Now, quiet as a grave.

name: War Numen's Crown
flavor: Show them you can contain multitudes, and your interiority will spawn nightmares.

name: Willbreaker's Watch
flavor: Their howls of terror mark your arrival.

name: Witness Helm
flavor: "The Awoken numbers are fewer now. But our will to fight remains undiminished." —Petra Venj

name: Zhurong
flavor: For whom do you fight? Do you even know their names?

name: Helm of Triumph
flavor: Triumph sings in your ears, in your blood, in your soul.

name: Spliced Cosmoclast Helm
flavor: General, my team did not intend for SIVA to have military applications. ~SIVA.MEM.WB014

name: Scarab's Vigil Helm
flavor: "We watch, and we wait. And we train." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Helm
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Days of Iron Crown
flavor: "When the Last of Lords unfurled the Banner once again, who took up arms to march beneath it?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cosmoclast Helm
flavor: General, my team did not intend for SIVA to have military applications. ~SIVA.MEM.WB014

name: High Command Helm
flavor: This is the face of justice.

name: Eon Tracer Helm
flavor: "It's too much… turn it off… let me out!" —RECORD-449-CHASM-6263

name: Endling Helm
flavor: We will only be extinct when the last of us is gone.

name: Stellar Impact Helm
flavor: Welcome to Mark 2 STELLAR IMPACT. Guaranteed to make an impression—literally and figuratively—or your Glimmer back.

name: Mangonel Type 2
flavor: "Tactics? Psh. Just use your head. Literally ram your head into them." —Wei Ning

name: Raku Gwener Type 1
flavor: Crucible variant. Golden Age components have been refoamed for optimal durability.

name: Agema
flavor: "Proactive mobility is a luxury. Reactive mobility is a necessity." - from a doctrinal dispute

name: Arihant
flavor: Some Titans speak of a transcendent state found only in battlefield success.

name: Armada
flavor: Cabal tactics assume they're bigger and less breakable than their opponents. Go make them revise.

name: Astrolord Greaves
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Blindsight Greaves
flavor: "The courage to walk into the Darkness, but strength to return to the Light." —Parables of the Allspring

name: BRONTIOS
flavor: When you stomp your feet, the ground should shake. If it doesn't, try adjusting the rumble packs in the soles.

name: Commando
flavor: Commando fireteams rely on their Ghosts for field intelligence and demolition plans.

name: Commando Custom
flavor: Crucible terrain is defined by ammo drop points and the sites where Ghosts revive their Guardians.

name: Dead Light Greaves
flavor: "When all is shadow, know your journey has begun." —Arach Parnell

name: Desolate Greaves
flavor: Transformation is not always revelation.

name: Dunemarchers
flavor: "Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace."

name: DURGA-GNT
flavor: I am a DURGA-GNT SYME TACTICAL TREAD. Let me walk on the broken corpses of your foes.

name: Duskrender
flavor: As part of the Pilgrim Guard, Tarlowe guided many refugees to safety behind the City's walls.

name: Elector's Greaves
flavor: Our footfalls forge the path to a new age.

name: Exodus Greaves
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Fieldplate
flavor: The sheer mass of Titan armor can break stone.

name: Firebreak
flavor: This design rebels against the defensive dogma of many Titan orders.

name: Garuda
flavor: "You had a place among us once. I thought that you could again. I was wrong." —Lilavati-12

name: Gatewatch
flavor: When the enemy presses the City, the final order will always be: stand your ground.

name: Greaves of No Tomorrow
flavor: When the last war comes, we will be the victors.

name: Greaves of the Exile
flavor: "Many followed him when he left—if not with their feet, then with their hearts." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Greaves of the Pariah
flavor: "To know true color, you must first know Darkness." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Greaves of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Gwalior
flavor: "Remember that you carry the City's hopes. Go swiftly, and choose a place to make your stand."

name: Harrowed War Numen's Boots
flavor: Speak, and the Darkness obeys. Command, and the song turns upon itself.

name: Heliopause Greaves
flavor: We'll walk if we have to.

name: Hesperos
flavor: Like the deep-sea divers of old, the Hesperonauts plunged into the fiery calderas of Venus.

name: Highlander
flavor: One legend speaks of a Titan whose methodical, scrupulous patrol never met a foe. Was she still a hero?

name: Holdfast
flavor: Life's too short for a bad pair of boots - even on the second go round.

name: Illyrian
flavor: Titan doctrine grapples with the balance between fixed strength and fluid, positional advantage.

name: Immanent War Greaves
flavor: Stride through chaos; leave ash in your wake.

name: Infinite Lines Greaves
flavor: "Every time I look, it's like—the Darkness just grows larger." —RECORD 345-CHASM-6736

name: Iron Breed Greaves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Companion Greaves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Greaves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan
flavor: We leave the City to ensure there will still be a City when we return."

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: Are you prepared to walk where no one has trod for centuries?

name: Justicar's Greaves
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: Kabr's Forceful Greaves
flavor: He was claimed by the Vault. His armor and myth are all that remain.

name: Kallipolis Greaves
flavor: A City is only as strong as its leader.

name: Kellslayer's Greaves
flavor: All that remains are broken bodies and the lingering hint of dissipated ether.

name: Knight
flavor: Based on the Fieldplate design, the Knight pattern employs spinmetal and relic iron, sparing no expense.

name: Lightmail
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost with available mass, this basic armor is very thin on plating.

name: Mk. 44 Stand Asides
flavor: Pardon me. Coming through.

name: Molniya
flavor: "I will endure a thousand thousand deaths, if each one buys a piece of victory."

name: Molniya Custom
flavor: Relentless advance. All-terrain grip. Sporty trim.

name: Monitor
flavor: "If a Hunter accuses you of hopping, tell them you're using rapid bounding traversal." - Gravitas Doctrines

name: Murvaux
flavor: "Kei-Ying. Gave his last full measure at Twilight Gap." —The Last Stands of First Pillars

name: MYCENAE
flavor: Whomever owned these boots had weird-shaped feet.

name: Objekt 959 Greaves
flavor: How does it feel to land a six-meter jump in full armor? That depends who you're landing on.

name: Oblivion Greaves
flavor: It will be cold and harrowing and we will not all survive. But it must be done.

name: Order's Greaves
flavor: Our choice is simple: find our strength, or face extinction.

name: Pacorus
flavor: "What happens to Guardians when they die for the last time?"

name: Pandion
flavor: Crucible variant. Rheostatic casings move with you like a second skin.

name: Peregrine Greaves
flavor: Victory from on high.

name: Queen's Guard Greaves
flavor: Carry yourself lightly, and with pride.

name: Raku Crucible Type
flavor: Crucible custom. Conformal gas injectors control fatigue with coolant and salve.

name: Raku Fulcrum
flavor: Crucible custom. Replace flash-burn heat sinks after prolonged engagements.

name: Scoutmail
flavor: Layers of ceramic, alloy, field drivers, and paracausal Light work together to give Titan armor surprising mobility.

name: Spearhead
flavor: "Evade the Cabal counterattack? My friend, they're finally sending us something worth killing." —Wei Ning

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Taroudant
flavor: "Wherever you go, your footprints mark the City's outermost walls."

name: Toutatis
flavor: After intense combat, the ankle plates will sometimes arc into the dust.

name: Ursus Tactical
flavor: "Shaxx is always telling us to stick together. I've come to think Shaxx really loves to watch us eat grenades."

name: Vanir
flavor: Smooth, tightly sealed plate speaks to the work of a master craftsperson aided by a Ghost.

name: VISIGOTH
flavor: The preferred armor pattern of Jagi's Host.

name: War Numen's Boots
flavor: Speak, and the Darkness obeys. Command, and the song turns upon itself.

name: Watchers' Greaves
flavor: "Light burns. Light heals. Light blinds. Light reveals." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Willbreaker's Greaves
flavor: The ground shudders beneath your feet.

name: Winged Sun Greaves
flavor: "Feet alone cannot take us to where we're going." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Witness Greaves
flavor: "Losing Queen very bad. What we do now is for her." —Variks

name: Zhurong
flavor: "To those behind the Wall, love and service. To those outside it, fury and fire." —Pilgrim Guard maxim

name: Dunemarchers
flavor: Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace.

name: Stellar Impact Greaves
flavor: Welcome to Mark 2 STELLAR IMPACT. Let's work on your entrance.

name: Spliced Cosmoclast Greaves
flavor: Willa, some of history's greatest inventions began as unintended side effects. ~SIVA.MEM.CL015

name: Scarab's Vigil Greaves
flavor: "The challenge will come when you least expect it. You must be ready." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Iron Saga Greaves
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Days of Iron Greaves
flavor: "When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cosmoclast Greaves
flavor: Willa, some of history's greatest inventions began as unintended side effects. ~SIVA.MEM.CL015

name: Endling Greaves
flavor: We are endangered, but we can save ourselves.

name: Eon Tracer Greaves
flavor: "I feel like every time I find the thread it slips through my fingers." —RECORD-448-CHASM-6565

name: High Command Greaves
flavor: Rise above the noise. Take the throne.

name: Mangonel Type 2
flavor: "An unjust commander is not worthy of loyalty." —Ouros

name: Raku Gwener Type 1
flavor: Crucible variant. Conformal gas injectors prevent overheating.

name: Greaves of Triumph
flavor: They tell your story everywhere you go: how you went to the end of the world and came home.

name: "Atlas's Burden"
flavor: "Other ages had the phalanx, the carrier, the KKV. Now you are the defining weapons system of our time."

name: "Blood and Mortar"
flavor: "A distraction? The Crucible challenges our best. It is the finest training the City could ask."

name: "Cast in Blood"
flavor: "The naysayers in Consensus don't understand that we LIKE to fight each other." - Ain Suhu-ässä

name: "The Mandate"
flavor: "We reject this cumbersome doctrine of interdependence. Every solitary Titan must be a standfast against the dark."

name: "Ultimateless"
flavor: Those who bear this mark vow to always test the limits of Light against the Light itself.

name: Avenger Mark
flavor: "I require no miracles. We will reclaim our worlds with systematic, aggressive action against enemy assets. "

name: Bastion Mark
flavor: Field repairs are part of the Titan creed, but the particularly devoted clip spare tools to their mark.

name: Dead Light Mark
flavor: "Beyond the City. Yes, beyond the Traveler." —Arach Jalaal

name: Deep Stone Crypt
flavor: A badge illustrating the infamous subroutine which seeded the first Exo consciousness.

name: Defender's Mark
flavor: At Six Fronts, defending the Wall was not enough. Titans had to become a wall.

name: Devils' Mark
flavor: The battle never ends.

name: First Pillar Mark
flavor: The many strategic victories of the First Pillar Order are not without cost.

name: Five Mile Mark
flavor: Radagast's Host made it five miles from the City's first walls. This pattern commemorates their march.

name: Formation Mark
flavor: Crucible tactics explore the tension between team cohesion and individual bravura.

name: Freeholder's Memory
flavor: The symbol of the great city of Freehold, the lost gem of Mars.

name: Garuda Mark
flavor: Forged in fire and darkness. Lit up like a thousand thousand suns.

name: Golden Hour Mark
flavor: I wear this in service. I earned this by sacrifice.

name: Heliopause Mark
flavor: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

name: Hesperonaut Mark
flavor: Our heritage is not one of war, but of exploration.

name: Holborn's Host Mark
flavor: Genial old Holborn led a group of Guardians on several risky expeditions to Mars.

name: Honor of Cormorant
flavor: One of the remaining sashes of the Cormorant, torn in battle by a forgotten foe.

name: Immanent War Mark
flavor: The subtlest of wars still leave their marks.

name: Impervious Mark
flavor: "It was not a significant bullet."

name: Infinite Lines Mark
flavor: ...pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Iron Camelot Mark
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Radegast, he who was first among the peers of the Iron Banner.

name: Ithacan Mark
flavor: Slow and steady wins the race.

name: Jolder's Iron Sash
flavor: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

name: Jovian Guard
flavor: Choose your words and sigils well, for they are your remembering.

name: Kallipolis Mark
flavor: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

name: Kell's Mark
flavor: Be feared.

name: Kings' Mark
flavor: Take the throne.

name: Light of the Great Prism
flavor: "When the long dark closes around us, we will be the last light." - Wei Ning

name: Lightning Mark
flavor: "The sun low in the sky, the wind in your hair, your enemies piled at your feet. Perfection."

name: Mark of a Kellslayer
flavor: "See this mark and know: by my hands a Kell has fallen."

name: Mark of Bluster
flavor: "The Blustery Brew" is a favorite City tavern amongst Titans.

name: Mark of Chaos
flavor: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

name: Mark of Command
flavor: "A successful defense prolongs a war. A successful attack ends it."

name: Mark of Contention
flavor: The mighty Thalor was invincible in the Crucible - until Dredgen Yor, and his Thorn.

name: Mark of Desolation
flavor: Did that shadow just move?

name: Mark of Diligence
flavor: Titan armor is crafted by legion members, not the City's foundries. Every would-be smith proves themselves on Fieldplate.

name: Mark of Discipline
flavor: Novice Titans are expected to adapt to their new lives with discipline and determination.

name: Mark of Favor
flavor: City communities work together to produce these marks as gifts for their champions.

name: Mark of Fortitude
flavor: Some historians mark the rise of Fieldplate as the moment the Titan orders found their footing.

name: Mark of Fortune
flavor: "I would trust it to thee if it were silver; I would give it even if it were gold." - the Edda

name: Mark of Fury
flavor: "We can wait here until the Traveler falls! Or we can go out there and kill them!" - from a doctrinal dispute

name: Mark of History
flavor: Titan marks are worn to honor the history of individuals or entire orders.

name: Mark of Jagi's Host
flavor: Jagi's Host was last seen marching south of the Cosmodrome, toward the shores of the Caspian Sea.

name: Mark of Lost Charge
flavor: A zealous few sneer at the legend of Six Fronts. Our invincible defense was a waste, they say. We should have charged.

name: Mark of Mourning
flavor: Some Guardians have a hard time relating to the rest of the City. Others know their struggles all too well.

name: Mark of No Tomorrow
flavor: Passion and patience in equal measure will open the unlimited way.

name: Mark of Oblivion
flavor: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

name: Mark of Passage
flavor: Within the walls, weary wanderers can find rest.

name: Mark of Renown
flavor: Robust and flexible, the iconic Fieldplate pattern has served every Titan order.

name: Mark of Resolve
flavor: "You cannot control the enemy. You can control yourself. The real victory lies within." - Pujari, Transcript VII

name: Mark of Sacrifice
flavor: Sometimes the mark will tangle in the armor. Shred it without hesitation. It, too, is prepared to sacrifice.

name: Mark of Thunder
flavor: "What is the power of the lightning without the roar of the thunder?" —Wei Ning

name: Mark of Unity
flavor: The Six Fronts, perhaps the most recognizable element used in Titan marks, memorializes a mighty stand.

name: Mark of Wings
flavor: News travels fast in the City.

name: Mark of the Anchor
flavor: Titan orders are often accused of dour fatalism. But there are those who celebrate all they protect.

name: Mark of the Arena
flavor: City dwellers often sport totems and tunics denoting their favorite Crucible combatants and teams.

name: Mark of the Beacon
flavor: "A singer came to me, saying, 'You protect me, and I do nothing in return.' I told him to sing, and he understood." - Saint-14

name: Mark of the Bulwarks
flavor: "War upon stone and it grows weaker. War upon man and he grows stronger. Which shall your wall be built of?"

name: Mark of the Chain
flavor: Even at Six Fronts, the City's darkest hour, some Titans broke orders, but the Chain prevailed.

name: Mark of the Chosen
flavor: "Your Light drives your armor. Do not speak of yourself as separate from the plate." - Pujari, Transcript XV

name: Mark of the Circle
flavor: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

name: Mark of the Conqueror
flavor: "THE LAST AND SUREST ARGUMENT" - traditional inscription for the right gauntlet, attributed to Wei Ning

name: Mark of the Dauntless
flavor: "Yes, we've achieved the objective. And the next. And the…were we supposed to stop attacking?" —Wei Ning

name: Mark of the Devils
flavor: "I seek no worship, only war."

name: Mark of the Duskborn
flavor: "We called her Verok; it was her and her Thrall that finally overwhelmed him." - Eris

name: Mark of the Embattled
flavor: Marks are worn low on the body to avoid interfering with a Titan's arms or weapons. They still see wear.

name: Mark of the Executor
flavor: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

name: Mark of the Exile
flavor: "Though the City won a great battle at Twilight Gap, it lost an even greater mind." —Sister Lupe

name: Mark of the Exodus
flavor: The stars are calling.

name: Mark of the Far-Flung
flavor: Every Guardian's first act is to defend a home they have not yet known.

name: Mark of the First Pillar
flavor: Titans train to fight on dangerous ground, a first line of defense against any crisis.

name: Mark of the Fortress
flavor: Fortresses do not wait silently for war. They are schools, trading posts, monuments. Vessels for life.

name: Mark of the Gatekeepers
flavor: The Pilgrim Guard was the first Titan order, formed to protect refugees entering the fledgling Last City.

name: Mark of the Hidden
flavor: "And with the lone strength of the Titan Vell Tarlowe, we felt invincible." - Eris

name: Mark of the Initiative
flavor: Speak with the voice of the people, or prepare to face them.

name: Mark of the Keeper
flavor: When there is turmoil in the City, cool-headed Titans often help restore the peace. Sometimes it costs them.

name: Mark of the Kings
flavor: "No beast lords over Earth."

name: Mark of the Lost
flavor: Every Titan's individual legend could inspire a new lineage of marks.

name: Mark of the Lost Seven
flavor: One by one, the Ghosts of Jagi's Host returned to the City. If they knew of their Guardians' fates, they would not reveal it.

name: Mark of the Martyred
flavor: It is called the Firebreak Calculus: how much good could I do if I find the right place and fight until I die?

name: Mark of the New Front
flavor: The Firebreak orders strive to draw the battle away from the City and its interests.

name: Mark of the New Sun
flavor: "He loosens all bonds." - the Lokasenna

name: Mark of the Oasis
flavor: A Titan in the field is better than an oasis in the desert.

name: Mark of the Old Challenge
flavor: By their rules must you win, or not at all.

name: Mark of the Order
flavor: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

name: Mark of the Pariah
flavor: "I wear his symbols proudly in the City, to remind them that Osiris is not truly gone." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Mark of the Pilgrim Guard
flavor: Legend holds that Titans stood in defense of the first pilgrims to gather below the Traveler.

name: Mark of the Pit
flavor: Torn from a vanquished Wizard, it flutters in windless air.

name: Mark of the Protector
flavor: The first Titans led survivors to the safety of the City.

name: Mark of the Queen's Guard
flavor: One throne beneath the howling dark.

name: Mark of the Risen
flavor: A Titan's mark declares deeds and influences. Your Ghost scrounged this cloth together. It's a start.

name: Mark of the Rising
flavor: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

name: Mark of the Sentry
flavor: The City's enemies often use airmobile tactics. Some Titans train for rapid response to these landings.

name: Mark of the Six Fronts
flavor: Four orders of Titans held six approaches in the first great battle around the Last City, and not one front broke.

name: Mark of the Sojourn
flavor: Our will is such that we find strength in the gaze of Death itself.

name: Mark of the Sortie
flavor: At Six Fronts, two Firebreak commanders led a sortie beyond the walls. They reclaimed five miles of scorched land from the Fallen.

name: Mark of the Spawn
flavor: "It's not an Acolyte's loin cloth, it's the spoils of war." - Vell Tarlowe

name: Mark of the Stoneborn
flavor: "They don't fail." - Commander Zavala, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

name: Mark of the Sunforged
flavor: "Of all the Lights, we burned the brightest." —Unknown Sunbreaker

name: Mark of the Supreme
flavor: Titan lore memorializes the greatest warriors of humanity's past.

name: Mark of the Undying Mind
flavor: The Black Garden grows in both directions.

name: Mark of the Wall
flavor: "We have one city. One final chance. There are no forgivable errors. Be ceaseless in your vigilance."

name: Mark of the War Tides
flavor: "At the doom of Men he will return home among the wise Vanir." - the Edda

name: Mark of the Watcher
flavor: "The mark's just pretty cloth. What matters is what it stands for." - Pujari, Transcript IX

name: Mark of the Witness
flavor: "Fighting your enemy helps you understand your enemy. Don't get distracted." —Zavala

name: Mark of the Wolves
flavor: "I am the leader of the pack."

name: Moctezuma-Polyphonic
flavor: A mark of unity which celebrates the equality of all under the protection of the Traveler.

name: NOYB Mark
flavor: "One day in the Crucible tells you everything you need to know about a Guardian. Even yourself." - Thalor

name: Old Man's Mark
flavor: "Sometimes, I wish my Ghost had picked someone else."

name: Order of the Lost Saint
flavor: "His Light cast no shadows."- Paean to Saint-14

name: Pandion Mark
flavor: “Glory in the Crucible—that is the truest immortality a Guardian can attain.” —Thalor

name: Pioneer Mark
flavor: These marks recall the flags that waved over the first Venus colonies.

name: Racer's Mark
flavor: Your enemies will see the signs of your approach. They will not be able to stop you.

name: Radegast's Iron Sash
flavor: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

name: Season of Ages XII
flavor: A warbanner marking the twelfth era of the Titan orders.

name: Silimar's Iron Sash
flavor: Ward or fist, you cannot be broken.

name: Spektar Heliopause Mark
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Spektar Infinite Mark
flavor: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

name: Spektar Kallipolis Mark
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Spektar Pandion Mark
flavor: "Glory in the Crucible—that is the truest immortality a Guardian can attain." —Thalor

name: Spektar's Mark
flavor: The heat shimmers off the shield, refracting into broken rainbows.

name: Spirit of Saturn
flavor: A ceremonial badge worn by Titans in memory of the lost First Fleet.

name: Striker's Mark
flavor: "It's what we do. It's as natural as breathing." —Holborn

name: Sublime Light Mark
flavor: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

name: Sunbreaker's Mark
flavor: Once, these marks streamed proudly from the City's rooftops. Now, they are a symbol of defiance.

name: Tarlowe Mark
flavor: "The stalwart heart of the team. May his Light find its rest." —Eris Morn

name: Thalor's Golden Maul
flavor: The legendary mark of Thalor, a victor in the Crucible.

name: War Numen's Mark
flavor: Will you barter your soul in exchange for the chance to kill a king?

name: Wolfswood Mark
flavor: And beneath its branches, the Iron Wolves forged an unbreakable oath.

name: Year 1993
flavor: A pattern made famous by the restoration of ancient Golden Age tomes.

name: Idylls of the Iron Lords
flavor: "The tale of the Iron Lords is not over." —Lord Saladin Forge

name: Formation Mark
flavor: Crucible tactics explore the tension between team cohesion and individual bravura.

name: Cosmoclast Mark
flavor: The Exodus program would be interested in exploring SIVA's defensive applications. ~SIVA.MEM.CL013

name: Anathema Cannon Mark
flavor: "The Devils have gone too far this time." —Lord Saladin

name: Endling Mark
flavor: "I am haunted by the Endling, the last living human." —Arach Jalaal

name: Vitruvius Mark
flavor: "The great generals and tacticians of the past have much to teach us." —Commander Zavala

name: Toward the Sky Mark
flavor: "This is why we have Crucible arenas across the system. Eyes always up." —Lord Shaxx

name: High Command Mark
flavor: "The City demands a leader. Now, before it is too late." —Executor Hideo

name: Eon Tracer Mark
flavor: "We trace the history of war throughout the ages." —Lakshmi-2

name: Mark of Legends
flavor: The Titan who bears this mark withstood all that the Darkness could bring.

name: Scarab's Vigil Mark
flavor: "If the sun rises, it will be because of your efforts." —Parables of the Allspring
